description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Astral War is a card game where : * You are considered as fighter on the battlefield and have attack points. * There is no land, you get mana each turn depending on your type of player : warrior, magician or human. * There is no « summoning sickness » : once an ally is called on the battlefield it can attack.
description.short: Astral War is a card game where : * You are considered as fighter on the battlefield and have attack points. * There is no land, you get mana each turn depending on your type of player : warrior, magician or human. * There is no « summoning sickness » : once an ally is called on the battlefield it can attack.
